mapper.insert: INSERT INTO consult_record (id, student_name, consultant_name, room_no, start_time, status) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentName}, #{consultantName}, #{roomNo}, #{startTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, student_name AS studentName, consultant_name AS consultantName, room_no AS roomNo, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, question, conclusion, status FROM consult_record WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, student_name AS studentName, consultant_name AS consultantName, room_no AS roomNo, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, question, conclusion, status FROM consult_record ORDER BY start_time DESC
